NATIONAL ASSOC
ATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
January 31, 1958
14 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
Dr. Sam L. Becker, Director
Division of Television, Radio, FM
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
Reference is made to Ray Cheydleur’s letter of January 29, addressed
to you with a copy to Harry.
Harry is currently out of town, so I thought I would pass this informa¬
tion along to you. In the past, we have usually given certificates to
those attending the various workshops. We agree that it would be a
good idea to do the same thing for the Research Seminar, and we will
do our best. However, as you recall, the budget for this seminar was
very close and we had to pull in money from several budget items, and
it may not be possible to underwrite the cost of certificates. However,
we'11 see what can be done and will keep you advised.
Cordially,
Associate Director
HEH:jg
CC: Ray Cheydleur
